document_data.name: Al-Zabdiyat
document_data.caption: The islands of Al-Zabdiyat.
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Zabdiyat''', or the '''Bowl''', was a group of mountainous islands located near [[Masud Jazayir]] in the [[Nada al-Hazan]] achipelago in the [[Crowded Sea]].
document_data.Geography: The islands of Al-Zabdiyat were crescent shaped laying at the mouth of the Strait of Woe.
document_data.Inhabitants: Most travelers and sailors avoided these islands because of [[Khadiga]]. The [[sha'ir]] was known to keep dangerous "pets" that discouraged visitors to her sanctuary.
document_data.Rumors and Legends: A great domed mausoleum made of clear crystal was rumored to rise from the center of the lagoon.
